reviews.comments: La ubicación del lugar inmejorable, la cercanía a diversos servicios de transporte nos mantenía al alcance de todo. El departamento muy acogedor y tranquilo.

Depto sencillo tal como las fotos. Lo recomiendo para viajes de negocios. No es del todo hermético se escuchan ruidos de los vecinos. Tiene todo lo necesario para una o dos personas. Mabel muy amable y predispuesta. La zona es excelente con muchas propuestas gastronómicas, supermercados y accesibilidad total al transporte público.

Mabel es un amor de persona!! El departamento es hermoso y tal cual se ve en las fotos, hasta diría que mucho mejor! La ubicación del lugar es inmejorable!! Definitivamente más que recomendable!! Gracias por todo Mabel!

Todo muy bien, desde la llegada (Mabel me esperaba en el departamento y me puso al tanto de todo) hasta la partida. En el depto todo funcionó correctamente, el lugar esta muy bien, con muchos restarurantes y bares en la zona. Buena comunicación. Lamento ir solo por trabajo y no poder disfrutarlo mas. Volvería. Volveré.

El depto es ideal para dos personas, muy bien ubicado en zona de restaurantes y bares. Constantemente gente alrededor, hicieron del barrio agradable para pasear. Mabel ha sido una muy buena anfitriona, atenta a todas las necesidades ha estado pendiente de nosotros todo el tiempo. Nos vamos muy contentos con la idea de volver nuevamente pronto.

Pasamos una excelente estadía en el depto. Tal cual lo describe en la pagina y lo mas importante fue que la zona era segura y la ubicación del mismo mejor imposible. Lo recomendaría al 100 %...los anfitriones muy predispuestos y amables.
Excelente relacion precio calidad. Mabel muy calida!

Muy lindo depto con excelente ubicación. Siempre muy cordiales en todo. Por cuestiones de vuelo no pude completar mí estadía y Mabel me brindó una solución, muy amable de su parte. En algún próximo viaje la contactaré nuevamente.

El departamento es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, limpio, amplio y la cocina cuenta con todo lo necesario (horno, heladera, microondas). Ubicado mejor, imposible. Cerca de todos los bares/restaurantes y a unas cuadras de la parada de subte. 
Mabel y su esposo fueron muy amables en todo momento, fue muy facil comunicarse con
 ellos y en todo momento estuvieron atentos. 
Volveria a quedarme y lo recomiendo totalmente!
Muy bien todo! la ubicacion, el lugar muy calido y el trato muy amable y atento.
Tobo Bien! Buena ubicación
reviews.response:
María Pia, no entiendo el tema de wifi porque tus padres no me dijeron nada de ello. La instalación ha sido renovada por el IP (Proveedor de Internet) hace 2 meses y no hemos tenido reclamos.
Con referencia a los ruidos, al ser un área muy concurrida por gente joven, es probable que algunas veces haya ruidos, pero es el primer reclamo que recibimos nosotros. Lamento la mala experiencia, ajena a nuestra voluntad.
Mabel.

reviews.comments: Todo estuvo muy bien, y según lo acordado. El Dpto es ideal para un matrimonio, en medio de restaurantes y bares muy concurridos y (URL HIDDEN) recomendable para una divertida estadía.

La experiencia fue muy buena, sobre todo teniendo en cuenta el precio del departamento. La ubicación es excelente, en una zona llena de bares y restaurantes, con mucha actividad a toda hora y segura.
El departamento es como se muestra en las fotos, pequeño pero suficiente para 2 personas. Mabel y su esposo Eduardo fueron muy amables, y nos ayudaron con todo lo que les preguntamos.
Recomendable.
Muy acogedor el lugar de Mabel y una gran ubicación. Mabel fue súper atenta antes, durante y luego de la estadía para que el huesped este bien. ¡Muchas gracias!
Muy lindo y completo el dpto. Excelente ubicación

Como lugar de paso es correctamente normal, las instalaciones están en un muy aceptable estado, el lugar aunque presenta inconvenientes para logar estacionar un vehículo es muy agradable pues tiene mucho movimiento, sobre todo nocturno, pero muy tranquilo todo.
Mabel fue muy gentil y el barrio es muy animado, el departamento un poco pequeño para estadía larga pero para unos días en Buenos Aires esta super bien ubicado.

Mabel fue muy atenta todo el tiempo, y su marido también. La ubicación es realmente muy buena y linda, si te gusta salir de noche y quedarte hasta tarde paseando, comiendo o tomando algo; porque si no la zona en general al tener tanta movida es algo ruidosa, pero es segura.
El departamento está muy bien cuidado y limpio, sólo las almohadas eran un poquito duras.

Visitar Buenos Aires fue una experiencia maravillosa, y realzando este paseo estuvo la amabilidad como anfitriona de Mabel y su esposo Eduardo, la comodidad de su departamento y su preocupación por el bienestar  de sus huéspedes. El mismo cuenta con todo lo necesario para una estadía plena, en impecables condiciones, con acceso a buenos  restaurantes cercanos, supermercados y vías de comunicación para un rápido desplazamiento desde y hacia los centros de interés turísticos. Todo esto hicieron de mi permanencia, un placentero tiempo, por lo que recomiendo éste alojamiento en el cual me sentí muy a gusto.

Mabel es un sol de persona, se mostró muy interesada en que nuestra estadía fuera perfecta! El dpto es MUY CÓMODO y Esta muy bien ubicado. 
Esperamos volver! !

Me sentí muy a gusto en el departamento, es hermosa la vista y súper cómodo para una sóla persona. 
El barrio es hermoso, la ubicación ayuda mucho a sentirse a gusto.

La descripción del anuncio era correcta. Era la imagen fiel de lo que se publicó en la página. La ubicación del Barrio es excelente, muy seguro y Mabel fue una buena anfitriona poniéndose a disposición d lo que necesitaba.
Mabel es una persona cálida, amable e interesada por la comodidad y el bienestar del huesped. El departamento es muy confortable y esta cerca de todo. Muy confiable y correcta.
mabel y su marido me atendieron de primera, el departamento en optimas condiciones, la ubicacion excelente,

Nos encantó la atención y la hospitalidad de Mabel. ¡La ubicación es excelente! ¡Estamos encantados con Palermo! 
Sin embargo, la internet nos causó mucho dolor de cabeza, tanto como el aire acondicionado, que, además de sólo tener en la sala, no fue suficiente para el calor que hacía.

El departamento es perfecto para una pareja, pequeño pero tiene de todo, Mabel fue una excelente anfitriona que al pedirle plancha y secador de cabello no dudo en traerme sin problemas, la zona inigualable, varios restaurantes, cafes, bares súper buenos a pasos nada más! Nos encantó todo! Sin dudas volveríamos al mismo lugar! Sentimos que nos faltaron días para conocer todo lo que queríamos !! Increíbles 6 días

El apartamento es tal cual en las fotos, cómodo y práctico. Es un poco chico pero cumple con las expectativas y funcionalidad un 100%. El barrio es divino y cerca de todo. Mabel muy buena anfitriona... Sin dudarlo, muy recomendable!
Agradable

Mabel fue una host excelente. El apartamento es cómodo y la ubicación es genial. Lo recomiendo al 100%. 

Mabel is an excellent host. The apartment is comfortable and the location, excellent. 100% recommend it.
ubicacion Perfecta! una calle con muchos bares y restaurantes! todo lindo! volveria ciertamente! recomendo!
Apartamento ideal para dos personas. Muy bien localizado y comunicado en una zona segura

Esta ubicado en la zona linda.
Atención muy buena.

Nos atendio la Sra Mabel y su hijo , fueron muy buenos y atentos con nosotros , el departamento esta muy ubicado y es muy comodo , si le tuviera que poner nota del 1 al 10 , le pongo un 10 . Gracias por todo

Desde la recepción hasta el final de la estadía, Mabel y sus hijos fueron muy atentos y abiertos a explicarnos como funcionaba el apartamento y la zona. El apartamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos y sumamente acogedor. Estaba muy bien equipado para hacer de la estadía lo más cómodo posible. La zona es increíble y llena de mucha actividad y restaurantes. Definitivamente recomendaría el lugar y lo volvería a reservar en mis próximas visitas a Buenos Aires.

Bueno. La bienvenida y el trato de Mabel fueron estupendos. El barrio, muy bien ubicado, está a minutos a pie, a unos diez minutos a pie de dos paradas de metro.  Además, está poblado de restaurantes y tiendas, sin que ello lo haga muy ruidoso. Incluso la librería Eterna Cadencia, queda a dos calles de allí. El Internet funciona bastante bien, y el departamento, aunque pequeño, es suficientemente cómodo para dos personas y tiene televisor con cable, refrigeradora y agua caliente permanente. Ninguna queja y más bien una invitación para que lo renten.

El piso era tál como esperabamos : pequeño pero perfecto para una pareja ! Además, Mabel nos ayudó muchissimo para conseguir un taxista de confianza que nos esperó con un cartel en el aeropuerto y no dejó en la puerta del piso estando en contacto con Mabel para decir exactamente cuando llegariamos. En cuanto al barrio, era muy seguro, bien comunicado con el centro y incluso se podía ir andando a Palermo Soho, una zona preciosa !

Fue un placer conocer a Mabel. Ella era muy amable y servicial. El lugar del departamento es muy conveniente. Tambien es perfecto para una persona o una pareja. Gracias Mabel. 

It was a pleasure to meet and work with Mabel. She was very friendly and helpful. The location of the apartment is very convenient. Also, the apartment is perfect for either one person or a couple. Thank you Mabel.
La estadia a lo de Mabel fue muy agradable, tanto el lugar como el barrio. El departamento es chiquito pero muy bien organizado y esta todo lo necesario. Lo recomandamos para otros viajeros !

Fue una buena experiencia desde la llegada que Mabel nos recibió y nos ayudo en todo. Como no conocíamos nada de Buenos Aires ella nos dio indicaciones y recomendaciones para recorrer los  atractivos turísticos más interesantes. El departamento está en una muy buena zona en  Palermo cerca de restaurantes, kioskos, tiendas. Facilidad de movilización. Un departamento muy cómodo, y la terraza tenía una preciosa vista. Mabel es muy amable al igual que su familia.

Nos encantó quedarnos en el apartamento de Mabel. Está muy bien ubicado, ya que Palermo es una zona muy bonita, con una agradable vida nocturna, tiene fácil acceso al transporte público   y es equidistante a cada barrio de la ciudad. El apartamento es cómodo, bonito y bien distribuido. La habitación es un espacio aparte, privado, lo que lo hace sentir más grande de lo que es. Mabel y sus hijos nos atendieron maravillosamente. Estamos muy agradecidos. No habría mejor lugar para nuestras vacaciones.

Mabel y su apartamento son fabulosos! fue sumamente amable al estar pendiente de nuestra llegada y nos estaba esperando con un botella de vino y una gran sonrisa. El apartamento esta muy bien ubicado, donde hay mucho que hacer y que ver. Sin dudas recomendaría a Mabel y su apartamento, son la mejor opción si deseas visitar Buenos Aires, definitivamente volveré. :)

Me gustó mucho el apartmento de Mabel.  Ella fue muy simpatica y estaba esperandóme cuando llegué al apartmento.  Le pregunté como llegar al apartmento desde el aeropuerto y me pusó en contacto con Mario.  El vino al aeropuerto para encontrarme y llevarme al apartmento y no costó mucho.  Fue un placer conocerle también, y les recomiendo este apartmento :)  

I really enjoyed staying at Mabel's place.  She was very nice, and was waiting for me when I arrived.  When I asked about how to get to the apartment from the airport, Mabel put in me in contact with Mario who for a small fee came to the airport and took me the apartment.  It was great to meet Mario as well, and I highly recommend this apartment to anyone who's going to BsAs :)

Mabel es una persona profesional, responsable y generosa, me dejo entrar al depto un par de horas antes, porque venia en un vuelo de noche. Si lo que buscas es un lugar simple, centrico, limpio y barato este es tu sitio.

el apartamento de Mabel, es pequeño pero tiene todo para una estadía de pocos días en bs as
está muy bien ubicado en palermo hollywood con muchos bares y restaurantes cerca
muy buena locomoción y muy seguro a la noche
Mabel super amable y puntual a la hora de nuestra llegada
volveríamos a quedarnos en su apartamento y lo recomendamos

Ecxelente, tanto Mabel como el apartamento!!!!
Muy recomendable!!!

Mabel es muy sympática, socorrida y atenta y el departamento esta muy bien localizado en Palermo y tiene todo que lo necesito. Para mi la estadía fue perfecta, una experiencia muy buena en una cuidad maravillosa y en un departamento excelente. Gracias a Mabel! 
I had the perfect stay at Mabel's apartment, which has everything you need and is in a great location in Palermo. Mabel was really nice and welcoming and helped me with everything I needed. Highly recommend it!

El departamento fue lo perfecto para nosotros, exactamente lo que hemos esperado.  Fue un lugar comodo y centrico para hacer viajes diarios en la ciudad de Buenos Aires.  Mabel fue muy atenta con nuestras necesidades y fue disponible para qualquiera pregunta que teniamos.  

Mabel was an excellent host and we appreciated her attentiveness to our needs while living in Buenos Aires.  The apartment was centrally located in Palermo and easy to access public transport from there.  The apartment was exactly as we expected it, small but comfortable and sufficient for our needs.

Great flat in the heart of Palermo neighborhood. It has all what you need to feel yourself confortable. Mabel was a very kind person and she was in contact with us all the time, making our stay great.

Mabel was an excellent host. We booked on short notice and was extremely accommodating in both the check-in and check-out process. Apartment is extremely well located, is simple but functional. Highly recommended.
Such a lovely, cozy apartment in a fantastic area! We had a wonderful stay.

Our stay at Mabels was great!
The communication before and during our stay was fast and we received good advices how to get there. 
Also the check in and check out were without any complication and on the agreed time. 

The apartment was very clean and well equipped (towels, soap, the kitchen,...)

The best was however the perfect location. In Palermo, amidst bars, restaurants and shops, it was not only a very safe area but there was always something to do. 

It’s easy to reach by bus or metro and has good connections to the other interesting areas. 

Our 6 day stay was great, we felt cozy and at home. 
We definitely recommend this place!
A great place, the hosts were super nice and flexible with check-in and chek-out times. I totally recommend it.

Mabel was a very responsive and gracious host.  The apartment is in a fantastic location in the heart of Palermo Soho.  Felt very safe and is a modern apartment.  

My only minor complaints are that the sheets provided, although clean, were rather old so they had lost their elasticity and fell off the bed during the night. Also, sometimes the bedroom would could get on the warmer side since the air conditioner was in the living room.

I would stay there again. Thank you Mabel.

Many thanks to you for all your help and giving us advise how to get registered with Air BNB as it wasn't easy and if it wasn't for you we would not have continued to registered with air BnB.  Loved our stay so safe and secure and everything we needed was in apartment, great location for lovely dinning so many eating places all in a hop skip and jump. Many thanks to Eduardo for taking us to the boat departure when taxi let us down. Also great to know your son was always on wats app if we needed Xtra help with English. So loved our stay and will return. Cheers Dona and Steve

The apartment is very nice, but there was only one grip in the room and there was no adapter and another in the kitchen next to the washbasin. the internet connection is obsolete, but it worked just near the router. the apartment is nice and panoramic and clean.

Mabel’s apartment is lovely and cozy, ideal for a couple. We stayed for 10 days and we loved Palermo where the apartment is located - a vibrant neighborhood with plenty of great bars and restaurants. We appreciated the well equipped kitchen for the nights we wanted to stay in and cook. Would stay again for sure!

Bom apartamento, localização boa em Palermo, próximo à ônibus, é um pouco longe do metrô. Apartamento limpo e aconchegante, Wi-Fi deixou a desejar, não funcionava bem todos os dias e somente na sala, mas nada que atrapalhasse. Colchão mole, e pode ser desconfortável dependendo da pessoa. A cozinha com utensílios básicos. Tive problema no check in, apesar de aceitarem me receber um pouco antes, fiquei esperando duas horas em frente ao prédio, acho que poderiam ter me avisado que não teria ninguém pra me receber se eu chegasse fora do horário estipulado. Foi bem chata a situação, e o tempo de espera na rua, e a Mabel estava no apartamento, e eu não fiquei sabendo. Foi bem confuso e chato isso. Mas, no geral foi uma boa estadia.
reviews.response:
Gabriel, 
Lamentamos que o colchão não fosse do seu agrado.
O metrô (metrô) está localizado a 550 metros do apartamento (é a estação de Palermo da linha D (verde).
A cozinha tem equipamento básico com microondas, geladeira, forno elétrico, fogão a gás e forno, louça para duas pessoas
Nunca tivemos problemas na Internet e funciona no quarto, na sala de estar, na varanda e em todo o apartamento ..
O check-in é às 15 horas.
Tentamos, no seu caso, ajustar-nos para recebê-los antes dessa hora.
Você prometeu chegar às 12h30 da manhã.
Chega às 1:40 p.m.
Mabel estava esperando no apartamento.
Você não se lembrou de qual andar ou carta o apartamento tinha e é por isso que você ficou esperando na recepção.
Estamos satisfeitos por ter tido uma boa estadia em Buenos Aires.
Mabel.

Lamentamos que el colchon no fuera de su agrado.
El Subte (metro) se encuentra a 550 metros del departamento (la estacion Palermo de la linea D verde).
La cocina tiene equipamiento standard con microondas, heladera, horno electrico, cocina a gas y su horno, vajilla para dos personas
Nunca tuvimos problemas de internet y funciona en la habitacion, en el salon, en el balcon y en todo el departamento..
El horario de check in es a las 15 hs. 
Tratamos en su caso, de ajustarnos para recibirlos antes de esa hora.
Usted se comprometió a llega a a 12:30 hs.
Usted llego a 13:40 hs.
Mabel estaba esperando en el departamento.
Usted NO recordaba que piso ni que letra tenia el departamento y quedo esperando en la recepción.
Nos agrada que haya tenido una buena estadia en Buenos Aires.
Mabel.

reviews.comments: Mabel est adorable, disponible et ponctuelle. L appartement est très bien placé. Parfait pour un couple. Très bon séjour!

J'avais séjourné auparavant avec une amie dans un autre appartement de Mabel, avec deux chambres. Celui-ci convenait parfaitement pour une personne seule ou un couple. La petite terrasse ensoleillée y est très agréable ! 
Très bonne relation avec Mabel et Eduardo et grandement facilitée par Flavio leur fils parfaitement francophone.
Mabel é uma ótima anfitriã e tem um apartamento ótimo e muito bem localizado. Recomendamos muito o apartamento e o local.

O apartamento é super bem localizado, na região tem vários restaurantes bacanas e 3 opções de mercados bem próximos. No mais, o chuveiro é bem quentinho, tudo limpinho, cama confortável e a Mabel e sua família são ótimos anfitriões, estavam sempre disponíveis e foram bem flexíveis  quanto aos nossos horários de check in e check out. Para quem é do Brasil as tomadas da sala e da cozinha servem no nosso padrão e não precisam de adpatador.
Fabulous stay, perfect location close to a lot of great restaurants and bars!

The apartment was great. It was clean and comfortable. Most of all, the location is perfect. It doesn't get any better than in the heart of Palermo. I would definitely recommend this apartment. The only problem I had was that the toilet was having trouble and it flooded and made the whole bathroom wet. I tried to contact Mabel all day to get assistance but no one responded to me for about 6 hours. However, they eventually fixed the toilet and everything was fine. That was probably just a mistake and doesn't happen often. Overall, it was a great stay and I would recommend this apartment.
reviews.response:
Sari, the problem in the toilet was caused by you, when you mismanaged the mechanism. This never happens, otherwise there would be comments.
You also forgot to mention that one night you came late from a party and called us because you could not open the apartment door.
It happened because you turned the key upside down. Remember it was 2:00 am (dawn).
There was no more problems to stand out with you.

Sari, el problema en el toilette fue provocado por ustedes, al accionar mal el mecanismo. Esto No sucede nunca, pues de lo contrario habría comentarios.
Asimismo olvidaron de mencionar que una noche llegaron tarde de una fiesta y no llamaron porque no podían abrir la puerta del departamento. Sucedía 
que colocaban la llave al revés, sin darse cuenta. Recalco que eran las 02:00am (madrugada).
No hubo más problemas que destacar con ustedes.

reviews.comments: Mabel was a xtremely hospitable, helpful, and friendly. She went above and beyond to make our stay perfect. The location is right in the middle of restaurants, bars, and shops, and we couldn't have had a better stay.
Mabel is so kind and attentive. She will make your stay run smoothly.
Nice place to stay. Close to all amenities. Lots of restaurants and bars, only footsteps away. Mabel was friendly and easy to contact. I would definitely stay again! No complaints!

The apartment is in a fabulous location surrounded by great restaurants, night spots and milonga.
The shower was great, bed comfy and the kitchen had enough for us to make our first home roast meal in a long trip.
Mabel and her husband were very friendly and helpful, highly recommend this place!

L'appartamento è essenziale ed accogliente, la posizione è strategica. Ho amato molto il quartiere di Palermo, la sera era un po' rumoroso ma essendo all'8 piano non mi ha dato fastidio. Mi piaceva uscire sul balcone ad ammirare la città al mattino, mentre bevevo il mio caffè: vista migliore di quanto mi aspettassi dalle foto. nei dintorni ci sono alcuni piccoli supermercati e un fruttivendolo. 
La metro è a circa 10/15 min a piedi.
This is a lovely apartment in a fantastic location.  Mabel is extremely accommodating and is there to help you out with any problems.  I would definitely stay here again!

Great location. Basic apartment, the furniture is a little outdated, kitchen is good. Bus stops nearby, the closest subway station however is 15 minutes by foot. In the end it's just really good value for money.

Wow! Can't say enough good things about Mabel's apartment. I am a solo female traveler in Buenos Aires for the first time and this apartment was PERFECT to start my trip. It is very clean, secure and in a perfect location to venture a bit alone- I arrived very late at night and Mabel was there waiting, and showed me everything I needed to know about the keys and the building. The apartment is sunny and charming with the personal touch of Mabel's paintings. The restaurants on the block serve food late and Las Cabras (a must stop parrilla spot) is just  on the corner. Mabel and her husband Eduardo are incredibly kind and live very close if there is anything you need. She checked up on me mid week to make sure I had all I needed and was incredibly accommodating. I will definitely stay here again, it really gave me a sense of what living in the city is like.
That being said - this place is for the traveler that wants some night life, that likes to explore a bit of a hip experience. Palermo is young and vibrant and everywhere you turn there is a shop or a cafe. I'm not much of a ' 'tourist' when I visit cities more of a art museum, cool party with locals type - but it is centered enough to get to tourist things like Recoleta or San Telmo or the Parks in Palermo. I HIGHLY suggest staying here. 

GRACIAS para todo Mabel & Eduardo! Regresaré pronto!! Besito
reviews.response:
What can I say! Thanks a lot to Dani for such a nice evaluation, and I have to say the same. Sometimes, via Airbnb you meet someone who -you think- could be a part of your family, and being with him/her you feel like being at home. This is Dani: charming, easygoing, trouble-free, curious about food & beverages, wanting to explore every corner of the city...
Needless to say, I definitely recommend Dani to everyone at Airbnb!
Beso grande, Dani!
Mabel

reviews.comments: Mabel's apartment is in a great location in Palermo. Near restaurants, bars and nightlife but also a cool location for interesting shops and wandering during the day time. It's also a 10-12 minute walk to the city's metro system which was very handy. The apartment is good value. We had a great time and would definitely recommend staying there

Um apartamento pequeno com uma ótima localização, onde pudemos conhecer vários lugares andando e nos sentimos seguros.
Se você vier do Brasil não se preocupe com o padrão de tomada argentino, lá tem algumas tomadas que funcionam com o padrão brasileiro também. 
A Mabel nos recepcionou, o Eduardo fez nosso check-out e o Flávio sempre muito prestativo via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Todos muito prestativos.
Voltamos pra casa satisfeitos  com nossa estadia em Buenos Aires.

We really enjoyed our stay. Apartment was in a great location, within walking distance to many restaurants, bars and the train. Mabel was a very accommodating host, allowing us to check in early and drop off our bags. Highly recommend!

Mabel's place is an excellently positioned place to take advantage of the abundant restaurants and bars. The apartment is on the small side, but has everything a couple or single could want. There was a little noise coming up from the nightlife, but this wasn't bothersome  and no lift noise to mention. All in all an excellent property.

O apartamento está localizado em uma rua bem movimentada, que consideramos segura para caminhar em qualquer horário e é bem aconchegante! Está, aproximadamente, a uns 15 minutos da estação de metrô mais próxima e perto, também, do bairro Palermo Soho, onde há diversos barzinhos e clubs para se divertir à noite. Fomos até lá a pé mas voltamos de uber por medo, pois estávamos em duas mulheres. Enfim, uma ótima opção para quem deseja conhecer a cidade!

Mabel Is a very good perdón, ready to help in antes case.
They apartmet, Is siempre Smallville bit well equipped and nice.

Mabel's apartment is in the perfect
Location for your stay in Palermo. She and her husband live right around the corner and are extremely responsive to via message and solve any problems asap
L'appartement est parfait pour un couple, le quartier est génial avec beaucoup de restaurants et de bars, merci beaucoup aux hôtes

Mabel and her husband have been great hosts, reachable within minutes, flexibel with the check-out and just very, very friendly. I stayed with my sister for almost a week and we had a fantastic stay. The location is perfect, with the best bars and restaurants on the corner. At the same time, the apartment also serves as a spot to calm down and find some quietness. We would always come back! Gracias,lo hemos pasado super bien!
Always reliable, Mabel and her family are close, helpful and ready to improve your experience. Highly recommendable.

We had an excellent stay at Mabel's place. Palermo is a vivid neighbourhood with many bars and restaurants. It is near to the metro and busstation. Mabel was kind and helpful. The apartment was clean and provided everything we needed. We would recommend staying there!

The location is excellent.
The arrival time was coordinated previously and it was all fine.
I suggest to bring earplugs since the apartment is located just besides the elevator so every time someone takes the elevator you heard all the noise, so you can't rest much.
I will strongly suggest to have at least a toaster.
Additionally if they have many guest Mabel should have at least of what should be checked before guest arrival, since internet was not available until almost the next day.
reviews.response: Emilio, de 267 huéspedes, solo ustedes escucharon ruidos de ascensor. Hay un hornito eléctrico que se usa como tostador. El servicio de interner depende del (IP) Proveedor de Internet. En ningún momento usted reclamó durante su estadía, absolutamente nada acerca de la limpieza. Los calefactores estaban encendidos y yo le indiqué como aumentar la temperatura. Si su equipo de futbol (Palestinano o algo así) perdió (frente a un equipo local) debe reclamarle al Palastiano. El shampoo está en un frasco en el vanitory y todavía sin abrir. No era agua para beber, como le indiqué al llegar usted, era para regar la planta del balcón. Usted debe comprar lo que desea consumir. En los foros se lee que con ustedes siempre hay problemas. No volveremos a aceptarlos porque dejó todo muy sucio, para un uso normal de las instalaciones y elementos (una olla irrecuperable, la cafetera con el sello de goma quemado) y la evaluación no correspondía a ustedes, pero admito en error de haberlos evaluado bien.

reviews.comments:
The Apartment is well equiped and located in a great area. Lots of Restaurants and bars are near by, such as Supermarktes and busstops. The Apartment was very clean and cozy.
Mabel and her Family were very nice and helpful with everything. Would stay here again for sure!

A very nice stay at Mabel's, a place perfect for two in a  very trendy neighbourhood. It was very clean, cosy and also quiet in spite of the many bars in the street. Mabel and her family were very helpful and did everything for us to enjoy our stay. We recommend !

We had an absolutely wonderful time here! The apartment is lovely, very light and well-equipped with a great balcony. The location is perfect - the apartment is on a street with plenty of restaurants, bars and a fun atmosphere. Our host Romina (Mabel's daughter) was very friendly, welcoming us as we arrived and staying in touch throughout our trip to provide advice and information. Overall a great experience - thank you so much!

Muito confortável o apartamento, localização premiada com varios bares e restaurantes ao redor em todas as quadras em volta, fácil acesso ao metrô, ônibus, supermercados, bancos e etc. Ótimo atendimento, super prestativos.

Mabel and her husband were amazing hosts! They made check in very easy and even assisted us in hiring a taxi from the airport to their apartment.  The apartment was very clean and central to lots of bars and restaurants.  Supermarkets and ATMs in walking distance and extremely easy to hail cabs in the area.  Everything was easy and convenient. Highly recommended!! 

Mabel y su esposo son muy amables!  Ingresó al departamento fue fácil y nos asistieron con el taxi del aeropuerto al departamento.  El apartamento era muy limpio y esta localizado muy cerca de varías bares y restaurantes.  Se puede caminar a muchas tiendas y cajera's en la área.  Todo fácil y conveniente.  Recomendado de seguro!
O apartamento é muito bom, com tudo que se precisa para passar um tempo. O local é privilegiado com vários bares e restaurantes ao redor, mercados e fácil acesso ao metro.

Mabel is a great hostess! She's always up to help you with every single doubt you might ever have. The place is identical to the pictures and the location is literally the best! There are thousands of restaurants in the streets, supermarkets and the subway is also really close! I'd come back there
We had a great experience in Mabel's apartment. Her and his husband are so cute and responsible. Thank you for our stay!
We were very comfortable during our staying. And the neighborhood was excellent.

Mabel was very accommodating and helpful throughout our entire stay. She even arranged for a friend of her's to pick us up from the airport late at night. The apartment is very nice and cozy, and a great location in Palermo with easy access to transportation and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!

I had a great time in Buenos Aires staying at Mabel et Eduardo's place. The apartment is the perfect size for one or two people and the location is great, right in Palermo next to many bars and restaurants. Communication with Mabel was perfect and Eduardo was so nice to give me a lift to the metro station on the day of departure.

Great host and flat in one of the best areas of Buenos Aires. You have  everything you need and want nearby (restaurants, bars, clubs), but also a full equipped flat. I very much recommended this place.

Our experience with Mabel was great, as the other reviews can attest to also. The apartment was well equipped and surrounded by lots of great restaurants and bars. Mabel was attentive and friendly and always available by phone. Great place!

Mabel and her husband let me stay at their apartment as long as possible and let me extend my stay even on short notice. They were a great help for me, always checking up on my situation and if I felt good and comfortable. I'd always go back there. I really enjoyed my stay and I'm really happy to have met such sweet and kind people. Highly recommended!

Mabel hosted me for almost a month and she and her husband were so great. They even recommended me a very nice taxi driver who drove me to the airport in order to pick up my friend. He also took us to the airport when she left. The place was very comfortable and perfect for two people. The location was amazing, surrounded by nice cafes and restaurants. Mabel always made sure everything was okay and offered her help. She and her husband are very kind and sweet people and it was my pleasure to stay at one of their places. I'd always go back there!

The apartment is right in the centre of Palermo-Hollywood with a great view from the balcony of Palermo. 

Mabel and her husband were always taking care of us and were very helpful. We could always contact them in case we had any questions and they always got back to us shortly. They even managed picking me up and bringing me back to the airport by one of their friends, who is a taxi driver.
It was a great stay at the apartment and it was so nice having been hosted but such trustworthy, kind, sweet and lovely people as Mabel and her husband. This place is highly recommended !

Muchas gracias por todo!

The description fitted well to the apartment - it was located in a really nice place and I loved the balcony! Very nice neighborhood, loads of nice restaurants and perfect space for 2 people. Mabel was very attentive and made sure to check up and ask if everything was OK. Much value for the money!

Only thing I was annoyed about was the wifi-connection (#firstworldproblems), so if you wish to stream a series or movies, I don't think that the connection would be stable enough for that. But I think someone told me that this is the case in most of Buenos Aires.
